languages.text: {n}Зауэрбэк кривится в неприятной улыбке, и на левой стороне его лица становятся особенно заметны следы искусственной кожи.{/n} "Я — слуга династии фон Валанциус. Не явившись, я совершил бы недопустимую дерзость и уронил бы честь семьи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Зауэрбек кривится в неприятной улыбке, и на левой стороне его лица становятся особенно заметны следы искусственной кожи.{/n} "Я — слуга дома фон Валанциус. Не явившись, я совершил бы недопустимую дерзость и уронил бы честь семьи".

languages.text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."
languages.original_text: {n}Зауэрбэк кривится в неприятной улыбке, и на левой стороне его лица становятся особенно заметны следы искусственной кожи.{/n} "Я — слуга династии фон Валанциус. Не явившись, я совершил бы недопустимую дерзость и уронил бы честь семьи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an unacceptable insolence and wounded my family's honor."

{n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an unacceptable insolence and wounded my family's honor."

{n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

{n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

{n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

languages.text: {n}マハリウスが顔をゆがめて不快な笑いを浮かべると、左側の人工皮膚が一段と目立つようになる。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝の臣下です。不参加ということは許されざる無礼を働くのと同義。ザウアーバック家の栄誉を損なうことになりますので」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスが顔をゆがめて不快な笑いを浮かべると、左側の人工皮膚が一段と目立つようになる。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝の臣下です。不参加ということは許されざる無礼を働くのと同義。ザウアーバック家の栄誉を損なうことになりますので」

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯的脸扭曲着，露出了不悦的微笑，他左半张脸的人造皮肤显得更加刺眼。{/n}“我是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的仆人。要是我不来，那恐怕就是不可接受的无礼行为，会损害我家族的荣誉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯的脸扭曲着，露出了不悦的微笑，他左半张脸的人造皮肤显得更加刺眼。{/n}“我是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的仆人。要是我不来，那恐怕就是不可接受的无礼行为，会损害我家族的荣誉。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Macharius se contorsiona en una sonrisa desagradable, que hace resaltar aún más la piel artificial de su perfil izquierdo.{/n} «Sirvo a la dinastía von Valancius. De no haber venido, habría cometido una insolencia inadmisible y mancillado el honor de mi familia».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Macharius se contorsiona en una sonrisa desagradable, que hace resaltar aún más la piel artificial de su perfil izquierdo.{/n} «Sirvo a la dinastía von Valancius. De no haber venido, habría cometido una insolencia inadmisible y mancillado el honor de mi familia».

languages.text: {n}Un sourire retors vient déformer les traits de Macharius, faisant d'autant plus ressortir la peau artificielle qui lui recouvre la partie gauche du visage.{/n} « Je suis au service de la dynastie von Valancius. Avoir l'outrecuidance de ne pas venir aurait terni l'honneur de ma famille. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire retors vient déformer les traits de Macharius, faisant d'autant plus ressortir la peau artificielle qui lui recouvre la partie gauche du visage.{/n} « Je suis au service de la dynastie von Valancius. Avoir l'outrecuidance de ne pas venir aurait terni l'honneur de ma famille. »

languages.text: {n}In Macharius' Gesicht erscheint ein unangenehmes Lächeln, das die künstliche Haut auf der linken Seite noch mehr hervortreten lässt.{/n} "Ich bin ein Diener der Dynastie von Valancius. Nicht zu kommen, wäre eine unverzeihliche Unverschämtheit gewesen und hätte der Ehre meiner Familie geschadet."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Macharius' Gesicht erscheint ein unangenehmes Lächeln, das die künstliche Haut auf der linken Seite noch mehr hervortreten lässt.{/n} "Ich bin ein Diener der Dynastie von Valancius. Nicht zu kommen, wäre eine unverzeihliche Unverschämtheit gewesen und hätte der Ehre meiner Familie geschadet."

languages.text: {n}Macharius'un suratında tatsız bir gülümseme belirince yüzünün sol tarafındaki suni deri daha da dikkat çekiyor.{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetkârıyım. Gelmeyip çok büyük ayıp ederek ailemin namusuna dil uzattırmam."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's face twists into an unpleasant smile, which makes the artificial skin on the left side all the more prominent.{/n} "I am a servant of the von Valancius dynasty. Had I not come, I would have committed an act of unacceptable insolence and damaged my family's honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius'un suratında tatsız bir gülümseme belirince, suratının sol tarafındaki suni deri daha da dikkat çekiyor.{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanlığının bir hizmetkârıyım. Gelmeyip çok büyük ayıp ederek ailemin namusuna dil uzattırmam."
